title: Prohibiting the issuance of package liquor in the 18th Ward

abstracts.abstract: BOARD BILL NO. 161   INTRODUCED BY ALDERMAN TERRY KENNEDY           An ordinance prohibiting the issuance of any package liquor license for any non-licensed premises within the boundaries of the Eighteenth Ward Liquor Control District, as established herein, for a period of three years from the effective date hereof; containing exceptions and allowing, during the moratorium period, for the transfer of existing licenses, under certain circumstances; and containing an emergency clause.
